metadata.title: CVE-2024-48916 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Authentication bypass in CEPH RadosGW

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-48916` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ceph - 17.2.7-0ubuntu0.22.04.2
ceph-base - 17.2.7-0ubuntu0.22.04.2
ceph-common - 17.2.7-0ubuntu0.22.04.2

criterions.comment: ceph package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '17.2.7-0ubuntu0.22.04.2').
